script: There is a Hospital in the center of my hometown.
About 2 km North of the Hospital there is a Retail Area
I visited Park, which is 2 KM, East from Retail Area.
I visited Library, which is 3 KM, South from Park.
About 2 km North of the Library there is a Statue of Founder
And finally there is Town Hall which is East from Statue of Founder and 1 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Hospital to Town Hall following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Hospital, go 2km North to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 2km East to Park.
From Park, go 3km South to Library.
From Library, go 2km North to Statue of Founder.
From Statue of Founder, go 1km East to Town Hall.
